channel.title: Humza Tareen — Engineering Blog
channel.description: Technical deep-dives on cloud architecture, AI/ML infrastructure, and production engineering. GCP, Kubernetes, Python, and distributed systems.

item.title: Building an AI Evaluation Platform on GCP: 35 Microservices, 3 Kubernetes Clusters, and Lessons Learned
item.dc:creator: Humza Tareen
item.description: A deep dive into the architecture behind a production-grade AI agent evaluation system on GCP with 35 Cloud Run services, 3 GKE clusters, and 17 PostgreSQL databases.

item.title: Event-Driven Architecture on GCP: Pub/Sub, Cloud Tasks, and Cloud Scheduler in Practice
item.dc:creator: Humza Tareen
item.description: How we orchestrated a 6-phase AI evaluation pipeline with 35 Pub/Sub topics, dead-letter queues, and zero silent failures.

item.title: The Database Bug That Took Down Our AI Pipeline: Debugging AlloyDB SSL Connection Drops
item.dc:creator: Humza Tareen
item.description: How we diagnosed and fixed random SSL connection failures in AlloyDB that were causing 5% of our evaluation tasks to fail.

item.title: How to Build Idempotent Cloud Tasks Handlers in Python
item.dc:creator: Humza Tareen
item.description: A practical guide to building idempotent handlers for Google Cloud Tasks with FastAPI and PostgreSQL. The pattern that eliminated our duplicate record bugs.

item.title: Zero-Downtime Embedding Migration: Switching Models in a Production RAG System
item.dc:creator: Humza Tareen
item.description: Step-by-step guide for migrating embedding models in production using pgvector, with zero downtime and zero data loss.

item.title: I Built an Open-Source AI Code Quality Tool — 38 Releases in 5 Weeks
item.dc:creator: Humza Tareen
item.description: How I built Rigour, an open-source quality gate for AI-generated code that supports 10+ languages and works with Cursor, Claude Code, Gemini, and more.

item.title: Building an RL Training Arena for AI Code Agents on GCP
item.dc:creator: Humza Tareen
item.description: How we built a reinforcement learning environment for training AI coding agents using GKE, Cloud Build sandboxing, Redis, and Firestore.

item.title: I Audited Our AI Platform and Found 25 Critical Security Issues
item.dc:creator: Humza Tareen
item.description: A systematic security audit of a production AI evaluation platform revealed SQL injection, hardcoded credentials, and a 3,677-line God Class. Here's the methodology and fixes.
